tasks.title: üèó Sprint 1 Day 1: Setup & Architecture
tasks.description:
**Date:** Monday, 3 Feb 2026

**Goal:** Complete project setup and define architecture

**Tech Stack Decision:** TypeScript + Tauri v2 (balanced: type safety + JS ecosystem)

**Tasks:**
1. Sprint Planning & Architecture Review
2. Project setup (Vite + React + Tauri)
3. Database schema design (Prisma)
4. Setup CI/CD pipeline

**Model Assignment:**
- **PM Agent (Main):** glm-4.7 ‚Üí Architecture, planning, big decisions, code review
- **Senior Fullstack (Sub-agent):** ollama:qwen-coder ‚Üí Heavy coding, debugging, implementation

**Reasoning:** Hybrid approach saves API quota while maintaining quality architecture decisions

**Expected Deliverables:**
- Project initialized
- Database schema documented
- CI/CD pipeline running
- Architecture decisions documented

**User Decision:** Both Sprint 1 Day 1 (Architecture) AND AI Finance Search should be pursued in parallel - both are valuable priorities

tasks.title: üîç System Alert: Search AI Finance SaaS Trends
tasks.description:
**Triggered by:** System web_search command

**Search Topic:** Exciting news or money-making opportunities in tech/finance (AI, startups, SaaS, markets, etc.)

**Findings Required:** Top 3-5 most interesting with brief summaries + why they matter + actionable insights

**Constraints:** Keep under 200 words total. Focus on actionable insights or disruptive trends.

**Status:** Backlog - User confirmed it's valuable and should be tracked alongside Sprint 1

subtasks.title: Search: Generative AI finance SaaS funding 2025

tasks.dod: Report with top 3-5 findings + actionable insights
